scripts.android:start: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && ./node_modules/react-native/packager/packager.sh
scripts.ios:start: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && ./node_modules/react-native/packager/packager.sh
scripts.android:shake: $ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools/adb devices | grep '\t' | awk '{print $1}' | sed 's/\s//g' | xargs -I {} $ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools/adb -s {} shell input keyevent 82
